summary.Title: Are you ready to make Copenhagen more liveable by replacing vans, trucks and other polluting vehicles with our awesome electric cargo bikes? Are you MoveByBike's new last-mile cargo bike rider?
summary.JobHeadline: Are you ready to make Copenhagen more liveable by replacing vans, trucks and other polluting vehicles with our awesome electric cargo bikes? Are you MoveByBike's new last-mile cargo bike rider?
summary.Presentation: This is not the 'typical' courier job because, with MoveByBike, you're directly contributing to reducing our CO2 footprint, while making a valuable difference to the city's noise and fuel pollution

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Are you ready to make Copenhagen more liveable by replacing vans, trucks and other polluting vehicles with our awesome electric cargo bikes? Are you MoveByBike's new last-mile cargo bike rider?
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
This is not the 'typical' courier job because, with MoveByBike, you're directly contributing to reducing our CO2 footprint, while making a valuable difference to the city's noise and fuel pollution and getting paid to keep fit at the same time!

This job is a great way to get to know Copenhagen in depth, with flexible working hours. You will be delivering goods to both businesse and private customers, riding MoveByBike electric cargo bikes throughout Copenhagen. You will use a delivery app, so you do not need to know the city's streets by heart. We also build clear, easy to follow routes- so we've got you covered!

What do we offer?

  • Be part of a team with social responsibilty and sustainability values.
  • Contract of employment with holiday pay (also SU compliant for EU students).
  • You ride alone, but there is always a team behind you (socially and logistically).
  • Part-time vacancies.

Who are you?

  • You're reliable and committed.
  • You're happy to work outdoors and don't mind a rainy day.
  • You have a positive mindset and team-player attitude.
  • No prioe experience is needed but you need to be comfortable on a bike.
  • Flexible and resilient.
  • Physical agility.
  • Good level of English and/or Danish.
  • You are able to work a minimum of two shifts per week from Saturday to Wednesday.

Please send your CV and a short cover letter to job@movebybike.dk

Please be advised that MoveByBike Denmark only hires people with a registered CPR number and address in Denmark. This requirement applies to non-EU citizens as well.

 

At MoveByBike, we celebrate diversity and do not discriminate on the basis of; race; religion; colour; identity; gender; sexual orientation; age; non-disqualifying physical or mental disability or national origin. All employment is decided on the basis of qualifications, merit and business need.
